member.name: M:Gie.IsatDataPro.IsatDataProMgsApi.GetReturnMessagesAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Retrieves Mobile-Originated messages (up to 500) based on a start-time.
member.param: Returns an array of bytes even if decoded payload is available.RawPayload is returned automatically if no Message Definition File defines payload decoding for the Mailbox.
Includes data type when using a Message Definition File on the Mailbox.
Messages sent from this start time reference (UTC) or later will be retrieved.
member.returns: GetReturnMessagesResult object that holds API response.

member.name: M:Gie.IsatDataPro.IsatDataProMgsApi.GetReturnMessagesAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.DateTime,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves Mobile-Originated messages (up to 500) based on a start-time.
member.param: Returns an array of bytes even if decoded payload is available.RawPayload is returned automatically if no Message Definition File defines payload decoding for the Mailbox.
Includes data type when using a Message Definition File on the Mailbox.
Messages sent from this start time reference (UTC) or later will be retrieved.
Filter to retrieve only messages sent by this Mobile ID.
member.returns: GetReturnMessagesResult object that holds API response.

member.name: M:Gie.IsatDataPro.IsatDataProMgsApi.GetReturnMessagesAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves Mobile-Originated messages (up to 500) based on ID of a previously retrieved message.
member.param: Returns an array of bytes even if decoded payload is available.RawPayload is returned automatically if no Message Definition File defines payload decoding for the Mailbox.
Includes data type when using a Message Definition File on the Mailbox.
A unique ID of a previously retrieved message, typically derived from NextStartID parameter of a prior get_return_messages operation where More messages are available to retrieve.
member.returns: GetReturnMessagesResult object that holds API response.

member.name: M:Gie.IsatDataPro.IsatDataProMgsApi.GetReturnMessagesAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves Mobile-Originated messages (up to 500) based on ID of a previously retrieved message.
member.param: Returns an array of bytes even if decoded payload is available.RawPayload is returned automatically if no Message Definition File defines payload decoding for the Mailbox.
Includes data type when using a Message Definition File on the Mailbox.
A unique ID of a previously retrieved message, typically derived from NextStartID parameter of a prior get_return_messages operation where More messages are available to retrieve.
Filter to retrieve only messages sent by this Mobile ID.
member.returns: GetReturnMessagesResult object that holds API response.

member.name: M:Gie.IsatDataPro.IsatDataProMgsApi.SubmitMessagesAsync(System.String,System.String,Gie.IsatDataPro.ForwardMessage[])
member.summary: Submits one or more Mobile-Terminated messages to the MGS to deliver.
member.returns: SubmitMessagesResult object that holds API response.

member.name: M:Gie.IsatDataPro.IsatDataProMgsApi.SubmitMessagesAsync(System.Net.Http.HttpClient,System.String,System.String,Gie.IsatDataPro.ForwardMessage[])
member.summary: Submits one or more Mobile-Terminated messages to the MGS to deliver.
member.returns: SubmitMessagesResult object that holds API response.

member.name: M:Gie.IsatDataPro.IsatDataProMgsApi.GetForwardStatusesAsync(System.String,System.String,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Retrieves delivery statuses of up to 100 Mobile-Terminated messages.
member.remarks: It is possible to query specific known message IDs or based on a datetime start.
member.param: Provides delivery statuses of all Forward messages since the specified datetime, usually the time of the previous IsClosed false state returned.
member.returns: GetReturnMessagesResult object that holds API response.

member.name: M:Gie.IsatDataPro.IsatDataProMgsApi.GetForwardStatusesAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Retrieves delivery statuses of up to 100 Mobile-Terminated messages.
member.remarks: It is possible to query specific known message IDs or based on a datetime start.
member.param: List of ForwardMessageIDs obtained from a recent submit_messages operation. This will filter on specific network-assigned IDs.
member.returns: GetReturnMessagesResult object that holds API response.

member.name: T:Gie.IsatDataPro.IsatDataProService
member.summary: Service for accessing IsatData Pro Gateway Messaging API.

member.name: M:Gie.IsatDataPro.IsatDataProService.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates new instance of service. Base Api URL https://api.inmarsat.com/v1/idp/gateway/rest MGS API access Id MGS API access Id

member.name: M:Gie.IsatDataPro.IsatDataProService.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates new instance of service. Default Api URL https://api.inmarsat.com/v1/idp/gateway/rest
member.param: Service name to be shown on Serilog logs

member.name: T:Gie.IsatDataPro.SubmitMessageState
member.summary: Submit message states for a to-mobile message.
member.remarks: When a message is submitted it is considered open and remains so until either an acknowledgement is received from the terminal or an error condition occurs.

member.name: F:Gie.IsatDataPro.SubmitMessageState.Submitted
member.summary: The system has accepted the message (Open).

member.name: F:Gie.IsatDataPro.SubmitMessageState.Received
member.summary: The system received an acknowledgement from the terminal (Closed).

member.name: F:Gie.IsatDataPro.SubmitMessageState.Error
member.summary: An error code specifies the reason (Closed).

member.name: F:Gie.IsatDataPro.SubmitMessageState.DeliveryFailed
member.summary: The system failed to deliver the message to a terminal (Closed).

member.name: F:Gie.IsatDataPro.SubmitMessageState.TimedOut
member.summary: Message failed to be delivered within 60 minutes (Closed).
member.remarks: A normal state when the message cannot be delivered is DeliveryFailed. This state is required in case the message is still not delivered 60 minutes after it was sent from the MGS.

member.name: F:Gie.IsatDataPro.SubmitMessageState.Cancelled
member.summary: Message was successfully cancelled by the client application (Closed).

member.name: F:Gie.IsatDataPro.SubmitMessageState.Waiting
member.summary: Message is queued (Open).
member.remarks: The terminal is in low-power mode and message will be forwarded when terminal wakes up.

member.name: T:Gie.IsatDataPro.ErrorInfo
member.summary: Errors definitions supported by the MGS.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.ErrorInfo.ID
member.summary: Unique error ID.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.ErrorInfo.Name
member.summary: Brief description of error.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.ErrorInfo.Description
member.summary: Long description of error.

member.name: T:Gie.IsatDataPro.ForwardMessage
member.summary: A Mobile-Destinated message including metadata.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.ForwardMessage.DestinationID
member.summary: Unique Mobile ID or Broadcast ID to send the message to.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.ForwardMessage.UserMessageID
member.summary: Client-assigned message ID to correlate to network-assigned ID.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.ForwardMessage.Payload
member.summary: A decoded message payload based on a Message Definition File provisioned on the Mailbox.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.ForwardMessage.RawPayload
member.summary: An array of bytes in decimal format. Required if not using Payload.

member.name: T:Gie.IsatDataPro.SubmitForwardMessage
member.summary: The body of the POST operation for submit_messages.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.SubmitForwardMessage.AccessID
member.summary: The Mailbox Access ID credential.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.SubmitForwardMessage.Password
member.summary: The Mailbox Password credential.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.SubmitForwardMessage.Messages
member.summary: The list of messages to be sent.

member.name: T:Gie.IsatDataPro.ForwardSubmission
member.summary: Metadata relating to a submitted Mobile-Terminated message.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.ForwardSubmission.ErrorID
member.summary: The error code associated with the message acceptance.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.ForwardSubmission.DestinationID
member.summary: The Mobile ID or the Broadcast ID the message was sent to.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.ForwardSubmission.ForwardMessageID
member.summary: A unique ID of the Forward message assigned by the system. The client can use the ForwardMessageID to query the status of the message using GetForwardStatuses or GetForwardMessages.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.ForwardSubmission.StateUTC
member.summary: UTC based datetime of the submission/acceptance.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.ForwardSubmission.UserMessageID
member.summary: Present if UserMessageID was passed in the submit_messages call. This number can be used by the client application to map its own message ID the system-generated ForwardMessageID.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.ForwardSubmission.TerminalWakeupPeriod
member.summary: The modem's wake-up period in seconds if it is configured for low power mode, (wakeupPeriod is non-zero), or zero (0) if not configured for low power mode.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.ForwardSubmission.ScheduledSendUTC
member.summary: If the modem is not configured for low power mode, this will be an empty string. If the modem is configured with a wakeupPeriod nonzero this field contains the scheduled UTC transmission time.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.ForwardSubmission.OTAMessageSize
member.summary: The size of the message (in bytes) sent over-the-air.

member.name: T:Gie.IsatDataPro.GetForwardStatusesResult
member.summary: Response to get_forward_statuses operation.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.GetForwardStatusesResult.ErrorID
member.summary: The error ID of the operation.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.GetForwardStatusesResult.More
member.summary: True if more statuses remain on the MGS that match the given status filter.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.GetForwardStatusesResult.NextStartUTC
member.summary: Datetime to use for the next GetForwardStatuses operation if More is true.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.GetForwardStatusesResult.Statuses
member.summary: Array of ForwardStatus objects.

member.name: T:Gie.IsatDataPro.GetReturnMessagesResult
member.summary: Holds a response from a get_return_messages call.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.GetReturnMessagesResult.ErrorID
member.summary: An error number for the API operation. (0 = NO_ERROR).

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.GetReturnMessagesResult.More
member.summary: A flag indicating if more messages are available to retrieve in a subsequent get_return_messages call.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.GetReturnMessagesResult.NextStartUTC
member.summary: The next start time high water mark for a subsequent get_return_messages call. 1/1/0001 00:00:00 indicates no more messages are pending.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.GetReturnMessagesResult.NextStartID
member.summary: The unique message ID high water mark for a subsequent get_return_messages call. A value -1 indicates no more messages are pending.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.GetReturnMessagesResult.Messages
member.summary: The list of retrieved messages.

member.name: T:Gie.IsatDataPro.Payload
member.summary: A decoded message payload derived from a Message Definition File provisioned on the Mailbox.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.Payload.Name
member.summary: The name of the message, unique within the defined SIN.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.Payload.SIN
member.summary: The Service Identification Number, also the first byte of raw payload.
member.remarks: Used to define a set of related messages or remote operations. SIN is intended as a context encapsulating both Return and Forward messages defined in a Message Definition File.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.Payload.MIN
member.summary: The Message Identification Number, also the second byte of raw payload.
member.remarks: Used to define a message or remote operation within a SIN context. MIN are intended to represent a specific directional operation and are often paired as Forward request with Return response.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.Payload.IsForward
member.summary: Indicates if the message is Forward/Mobile-Terminated.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.Payload.Fields
member.summary: An array of decoded message data fields derived from a Message Definition File provisioned on the Mailbox.

member.name: T:Gie.IsatDataPro.ReturnMessage
member.summary: A Mobile-Originated message including metadata.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.ReturnMessage.ID
member.summary: A unique ID assigned by the network.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.ReturnMessage.MessageUTC
member.summary: The datetime (UTC) the message was made available in the Mailbox.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.ReturnMessage.MobileID
member.summary: The unique Mobile ID that sent the message.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.ReturnMessage.ReceiveUTC
member.summary: The datetime (UTC) the message was received at the Satellite Access Station (aka Land Earth Station).

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.ReturnMessage.RegionName
member.summary: The system name of the satellite beam the message was received on.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.ReturnMessage.SIN
member.summary: The Service Identification Number represented by the first payload byte.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.ReturnMessage.OTAMessageSize
member.summary: The size of the message (in bytes) sent over-the-air.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.ReturnMessage.Payload
member.summary: A decoded message payload derived from a Message Definition File provisioned on the Mailbox.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.ReturnMessage.RawPayload
member.summary: An array of payload byte values in decimal format.

member.name: T:Gie.IsatDataPro.ForwardStatus
member.summary: Metadata relating to the Forward message submission.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.ForwardStatus.ForwardMessageID
member.summary: The system-generated ID for the Mobile-Terminated message submitted.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.ForwardStatus.IsClosed
member.summary: True if the message was delivered or failed.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.ForwardStatus.State
member.summary: The latest state of the Forward message.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.ForwardStatus.ErrorID
member.summary: The error ID associated with the message state.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.ForwardStatus.StateUTC
member.summary: The datetime (UTC) of the State of the message.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.ForwardStatus.ReferenceNumber
member.summary: System-assigned reference number.

member.name: T:Gie.IsatDataPro.SubmitMessagesResult
member.summary: Response to submit_cancelations or submit_messages_to_destinations.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.SubmitMessagesResult.ErrorID
member.summary: Error ID of the submission batch.

member.name: P:Gie.IsatDataPro.SubmitMessagesResult.Submissions
member.summary: An array of ForwardSubmission objects.
